name: FisherFolks Ballad
description:
Controls: (Arrow keys also available)

S - Cast your rod

W/Space - hit a note (the little ring things that come towards you)

A/D - Move the fish left and right (try to maneuver it on to the notes and hit W)

Story:

When one thinks of the humble art of fishing they imagine a person slowly waiting, patiently, until they feel a bite. This is the way of the Fisherman. The Fisherfolk on the other hand laughs at these patient fools, electing instead to cast their rod, catch a fish immediately, and tire the fish out by forcing it to dance to a sick beat. You are a Fisherfolk, lured to a quiet pond near the mountains by the promise of rare and mythical fish, although you feel that your fishing dancing skills will need to be on point to reel them in.

By: William Graham, Scott Chapman, and Antonio Mastroguiseppe
